titles.title: A resolution notifying the President of the United States of the election of a Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/19/1994--Introduced. Notifies the President of the election of the Honorable Robert Laurent Benoit as Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
